repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a manuscript of Taittirīya Brāhmaṇa. First blank folio is supported with other folio by inserting a new palm leaf. The other leaf looks newer to the one with blessings written in Granth script. According to VOHD the portion of the manuscript is identified as Taittirīya Brāhmaṇa Aṣṭaka 3.3.1 whereas it actually begins with Taittirīya Brāhmaṇa Aṣṭaka 3.1.1 First blank folio has hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu avighnamastu pālurumutsāmikurukakalkamaran subramaṇīyan muṇā aṣṭakaṃ .

msItem.title: Taittirīya Brāhmaṇa Aṣṭaka 3.1-1- 3-9

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 08 pp:210-212 VOHD II,7: p:855 entry. 2275

msItem.incipit:
1v 1 oṃ (2 illegible characters)davināyakagurubhyo namaḥ . hariḥ oṃ agnirṇaḥ path kṛttikāḥ nakṣatraṃ devamindriyam idamāsāṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ havirāsaṃ juhotana yasya bhānti raśmayo yasya ketavaḥ yasye
1v 2 mā viśvā bhuvanāni sarvā sa kṛtikābhirabisaṃvasānaḥ agnirnodevassuvite dadhātu] prajāpate rohiṇī vetu pani viśvarūpā bṛahatī citrabhānuḥ .. 1..
msItem.explicit:
113v 1 rpeṇādityāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaraṃ yo vā aśvasya medhyasya lomanī trayoviṃśatiḥ .. prajāpatir asminlloka uttarataḥ śri
113v2 yameva prajāpatirakāmayata mahānyatprātaḥ pra vā eṣa sarvaga ha vai tatra ya u cainamevaṃ veda catvāryaśītiḥ .. prajāpatira
113v3 śvamedhaṃ juhvati . hariḥ oṃ tripurasundaryai namaḥ . śrīkāmākṣyāṃbasameta śrīmadekāmṛ? svāmine namaḥ .

support.p: Hard wooden cover folio. Dark brown with some white pigment patches on the top.

extent.measure: 11 blank folio and 2 guard folio, 113 written

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil nuerals in the left margin.

additions.desc: śubhamastu is written on 1v in the left margin.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya Brāhmaṇa with the commentary of Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara Miśra Aṣṭaka III part 1 and 2 Edi by A Mahadeva Shastri and L Shrinivasacarya Motilal Banarasi das Delhi Reprint 1985 (Original Mayor Government press Publication Part I- 1911 and part II-1913.)

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.
